page.title: 15The Wimbledon Championships
page.content: The first reaction from people in many countries to "Wimbledon",is "ah yes, tennis".When the Championships begin, fans sleep out on the pavements near the courts,sometimes for several nights in order to get good seats.They sit there looking very tired with hundreds of coke cans and other litter around. Along the queue,tickets touts wander. Buses and taxis crowd the road and every parking place for a mile around is full.Shops on the way to the courts, and public transport, do good business. Going in, the fans search the crowds, hoping to see a famous face from the glamorous tennis world. The outer grass courts are surrounded by so many people that it is almost impossible to move to find the game you want to watch.There is clapping and shouting on all sides and everyone looks happy.
